title: Join Our Team
description: We are looking for dedicated individuals to join our team. Please fill out the application form below.
successMessage: Thank you for your application. We will review it and get back to you soon.

questions.text: Why do you want to join our team?
questions.placeholder: Tell us why you want to join our team

questions.text: What skills or experience do you have that would benefit our organization?
questions.placeholder: Describe your relevant skills and experience

questions.text: How did you hear about us?
